name: Strfry
short_description: High-performance nostr relay with LMDB storage. Self-host it with Docker using Yantr.
description: High-performance nostr relay with LMDB storage. Self-host it with Docker using Yantr. Strfry is a self-hosted application focused on network, social, storage, files. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Strfry on your home server to high-performance nostr relay with lmdb storage. self-host it with docker using yantr without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Strfry to manage your network workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
